CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT ( I_RS_Type__c ) = 'Type of Activity (TOA)' , 'TOA' , IF( TEXT ( I_RS_Type__c ) = 'Fields of Research (FOR)' , 'FOR' , IF( TEXT ( I_RS_Type__c ) = 'Fields of Research - 2008 (FOR - 08)', 'FOR - 08' , IF( TEXT ( I_RS_Type__c ) = 'Socio-economic Objective - 2008 (SEO - 08)', 'SEO - 08','SEO' ) ) )
)
CustomField.label: Classification Type Abbreviation
